sentences.en: A new ore - dressing plant is rapidly going up.
sentences.cn: 一座新的选矿厂正快速修建起来.

sentences.en: All the geologists take an interest in ore materials.
sentences.cn: 地质工作者都对一切矿物感兴趣.

sentences.en: Bulges and tentacles of ore extend haphazardly from a central mass.
sentences.cn: 矿石的凸出物及细枝不时地从中心块体伸出.

sentences.en: How many tons of ore can this machine crush in an hour?
sentences.cn: 这机器每小时可以破碎多少吨矿石?
铁是从矿石中提炼出来的.

sentences.en: Ore is normally associated with areas of high relief.
sentences.cn: 在正常情况下,矿石与地势高的地方有联系.

sentences.en: The average daily throughput was 1 , 370 tons of ore.
sentences.cn: 日平均产量为一千三百七十吨矿砂.

sentences.en: The determination of the amount of iron in ore is very important.
sentences.cn: 矿石中铁含量的测定是很主要的.

sentences.en: The net profit amounts to 20 dollars per ton of ore.
sentences.cn: 每吨矿砂的净利达20美元.

sentences.en: The net profit amounts to twenty dollars per ton of ore.
sentences.cn: 每吨矿石的净利为二十美元.

sentences.en: The ore minerals are bounded by the vein walls.
sentences.cn: 矿石矿物局限于矿脉之内.

sentences.en: They analyzed the ore and found iron in it.
sentences.cn: 他们分析了矿砂,从中发现了铁.

sentences.en: They refined gold out of the ore.
sentences.cn: 他们从矿石中提炼出黄金.

sentences.en: To smelt iron ore in a blast furnace can obtain iron.
sentences.cn: 在高炉中熔炼铁矿石,可取得铁.

sentences.en: We dowse oil and ore in South America for big companies.
sentences.cn: 我们在南美洲为一些大公司探测石油和矿石。

trans.tran_en: rock or earth from which metal can be obtained
